headline: Assessing Datadog’s Valuation After Strong Run and AI Driven Growth Prospects
summary: Wondering if Datadog is still worth buying after its big run as a cloud monitoring leader, or if the easy money has already been made? This breakdown will help you separate story from price. The stock now trades around $152.57, down about 2.1% over the last week and 23.6% over the last month, but still up 6.2% year to date and 89.6% over 3 years. Recent price swings reflect a tug of war between investors who see Datadog as a core cloud infrastructure winner and those who worry enthusiasm has...

headline: 2 Large-Cap Stocks Worth Your Attention and 1 Facing Headwinds
summary: Large-cap stocks are known for their staying power and ability to weather market storms better than smaller competitors. However, their sheer size makes it more challenging to maintain high growth rates as they’ve already captured significant portions of their markets.
